description: coarse weave black jacket with blue lining; deep side vents; front shorter than back; front edges with woven striped tape and embroidery; two short ties; neck band, yoke and sleeve tops heavily decorated on black satin; stylized animals and flowers in multicolored braid embroidery, gold tape and sequins; on yokes, horizontally twined raised metal tape edging; back lower edge has aqua horizontal band with four petaled embroidered flowers in pinks and greens
medium: Cotton, silk, gold metal tape, sequins
title: Jacket
